TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of slow-growing, malignant tumor that usually affects the ovary.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "granulosa cell tumor"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "tumor de células de la granulosa"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: tumor de células de la granulosa

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de tumor maligno, de crecimiento lento, que suele afectar el ovario.
